data.Question: I want to be able to view my company's data in real time via a dashboard
I want to be able to export data in different formats (Excel, PDF, CSV)
I want to be able to filter and sort information according to my criteria
I want to be able to create custom reports
I want to be able to receive automatic alerts in case of anomaly
I want to be able to manage my users' access rights
I want to be able to access the application from different devices (mobile, tablet)
I want to be able to integrate the application with our existing systems
I want to be able to customize the interface according to our needs
data.Commentaire: Customization limited to logo and colors

data.Question: I want to be able to benefit from responsive technical support
I want to be able to train my teams on using the tool
data.Commentaire: Initial training included, additional training on quote

data.Question: I want to be able to track my company's performance evolution
I want to be able to compare our data with sector benchmarks
I want to be able to automatically archive old data
I want to be able to collaborate with my teams on analyses
data.Commentaire: Report sharing possible, real-time collaboration limited

data.Question: I want to be able to schedule recurring tasks
I want to be able to manage versions of my documents
I want to be able to perform advanced searches in the data
I want to be able to create automated workflows
I want to be able to guarantee the security of our sensitive data
